class.name: ImportPipelineStep
class.description: This step transforms the input resources into output resources. The amount and type of in- and output resources can change. Avaible parameters should be exposed as exported properties.

method.name: _get_inputs
method.description: Select which exported resources should be used as inputs.

method.name: _get_outputs
method.description: Select which exported resources should be used as outputs.

method.name: _source_changed
method.description: Called when a source resource is changed. Avaible properties based on the source can be calculated.

signal.name: name_changed
signal.description: Emit to change the displayed name of the node in the import pipeline
